title: Blue Essence for people that leveled up before the update?
body: So my friend just joined today because I encouraged him to. And I asked how he got so much BE. He just started today and has over 4000 BE now and I'm jealous, because of the being I am. So if there was any way to compensate for this, I would be very happy. Or make it easier for higher leveled people to level up.

replies.body: And now I find out that you get stuff for leveling up. Shouldn't we be getting the loot that we could have gotten?
